title: My game crashes when in champion select before i pick and i lose lp for it...
body:
Hello everyone.......


Today i thought about playing Ranked and wanted to pick either Yasuo, Zed, Diana or Brand as they are my best champs

I saw that Yasuo wasnt banned so i wanted to pick him

There team banned 3 champs and the enemy team banned 3 champs and then our first pick which was the jungler was going to pick and then my game just frooze before i could pick and it crashed...

I lost a hole 10 lp from it, I tryed re-Installing

It didnt work it still crashed a toon

So please tell me... how do i fix this
